CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking advantage of this aggregation control approach , high - performance PSCs based on PffBT4T-2OD:PC71BM were fabricated affording a PCE of up to 10.8% .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PffBT4T-2OD
2. PC71BM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies. Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. PffBT4T-2OD
2. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid Material Name entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBT4T-2OD |
| PC71BM |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking advantage of this aggregation control approach , high - performance PSCs based on PffBT4T-2OD:PC71BM were fabricated affording a PCE of up to 10.8% .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)
2. PffBT4T-2OD:PC71BM (a type of polymer)

So, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "PCE" and "PffBT4T-2OD:PC71BM".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, I apologize for the mistake. Here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. PffBT4T-2OD:PC71BM (a type of polymer)

So, the only Material Property entity in the paragraph is "PffBT4T-2OD:PC71BM".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the valid Material Property entity in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PffBT4T-2OD:PC71BM |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking advantage of this aggregation control approach , high - performance PSCs based on PffBT4T-2OD:PC71BM were fabricated affording a PCE of up to 10.8% .

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. 10.8% - the PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) of the high-performance PSCs (organic solar cells) based on PffBT4T-2OD:PC71BM.

Note: PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) is a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell in converting sunlight into electrical power.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to Value of Material Property:

1. 10.8% - the PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) of the high-performance PSCs (organic solar cells) based on PffBT4T-2OD:PC71BM.

The entity "10.8%" refers to the value of the PCE property of the organic solar cells.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the Markdown table with the valid entities:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 10.8% |

The table has one column, "Property Value", and one row with the entity "10.8%" which refers to the PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) of the high-performance PSCs (organic solar cells) based on PffBT4T-2OD:PC71BM.
